documents.document: @NorthStand1994 Well from what I saw tonight I'll looking beyond that and a big move move to China or back to Scotland perhaps 😂
I'm watching highlights of Ligue 1 and my word the keepers are atrociously bad. 👀📝
@stmochtasfc Naughty little tap on the head. Defender wasn't happy 😂😂
@stmochtasfc Raging. Was terrible weather here in the Deep South so didn't want to risk it. Best of luck for the remainder
@stmochtasfc What's the weather like ? Tell me I made the correct decision staying at home
Got done an absolute kipper earlier by @ALI_BUPBUP5 with this. 😂😂😂 https://t.co/asE8TJCccP
@SkySportsNewsHQ @LCFC That's because he is brutal and will be lucky to get another English club
@GarryMonk Once they learn from it then its ok. They cannot show the same attitude in league games and need to pick themselves up. ASAP! 💙⚽💛
I can't even see Leeds getting a shot at goal the last 20 minutes 🙈
Well this is embarrassing. I hope they go and win it now. Would be massive for the club. ⚽ #EmiratesFACup
Typical & expected physical approach from them left a few lads battered and bruised but thankfully no upset today.… https://t.co/TRqVGcAc8k
Any danger BT. Give your camera man a cloth of some sort. I understand it's not ideal weather but surely it's rained before for a game 👀
Ready for a cold one in the morning. https://t.co/x26RW3cG8o
Although frustrating most of the time in the league, they really are brilliant to watch when they are in this form. #SOUARS #EmiratesFACup
Lincoln City 👏🏻 The stuff of legends. It's what the cups are all about. A day they will never forget. I hope they get a massive draw nxt rnd
@transferdicky @dazmanOnline My confusion is not direct at CG but Chelsea. Surely he is not the best option for a reserve on the entire 🌎
Someone tell me that rumour of Craig Gordon to Chelsea is a fucking wind up.... My Lord football has lost all reasoning.
You'd have put yer gaf on him to bang that in 🙄. He'll get another chance though #thegingerrooney
@NorthStand1994 Yeah im at him all the time to keep up with the young kids. He's getting old now ye see 👴🏼
@NorthStand1994 Let me know if you plan to do Esson in the future. I've a few for him? 😉
What a time to be alive 🔥🔥 https://t.co/pPkDZgLMOm

I'm just catching up with MOTD and for some reason I cannot put my finger on, I have a real disliking for Charlie Adam for some reason 🤔
@Ryanair Your webchat team are a disgrace. Closing the chats deliberately to get rid of the queue quickly. Tut tut
@TalbotAlan Yeah crazy game. Could've gone either way. Thanks pal. Best of luck for the remainder ⚽
@Johno9oc last time I travelled to Cork I got an unexpected custard so fingers crossed there's not a repeat of that 😅🙏🏻
@Johno9oc Yeah it's been a mad few games for everyone. Just couldn't call a result at the moment. We are 4th down in Cork
@Johno9oc Yeah they have some good players in fairness. Strange that they are struggling.
@Johno9oc crazy game. It didn't play too badly. It looked worse than it was in fairness. Although I don't think the grass seen much of it 😂
@Johno9oc Cheers pal. Made up for their goal. 🙈. I can't comment on officials anymore I've been warned a few times 🤐🤐
I was disappointed with how theirs went in but we showed great determination to get the result. Debut goal for Ryan… https://t.co/pZjIkwzMbw
@buzzer_rowe10 Agreed. Madrid will put some serious bread on the table for him. He needs to get out of there to become the best
Kevin De Bruyne will be the next player outside the normal two to win the Balon D'Or. Unbelievable player.
Goodnight for Spurs and Leeds within a couple of minutes. #MCITOT #BARLEE
Hugo has had a mare there. If he stands his ground he catches it with no danger. Pity because he is world class 🙌🏻⚽ #MCITOT

Swansea, Hull and Boro all to be relegated this season ⤵️ #motd

Happy 2017 to all of my friends and family. May it be a very successful year for you and yours. Stay positive 💛🎯. #happy2017 😘
@buzzer_rowe10 Ye never know pal. Scouts at all the LSL games now 😂
Anyone get offers for China, take them. The cash might not be avail in a couple years when they realise it's not working!! 🤑🤑. #seriouscash
@Dean21Clarke 2 deflections and Peno. Nothing to brag about 😉. We were robbed 4-2 up with 30 seconds to go. Ref had a mare.
Goes to show how far Leeds have come when Villa are happy with a point at home against us. Terrible decision from Cooper. 💛⚽💙 #MOT
Mignolet had a stinker for the goal but kept them in it there with the save. #LIVSTO ⚽
I think I'm falling in love with @GarryMonk 😍. Come on @LUFC !! 💙⚽💛🙏🏻 #MOT #prayforplayoffsorbetter
@MCYeeehaaa "Douvan is destroying decent horses" 100% correct, anyone saying they're not are fools but 1 thing is sure, Douvan is a machine
On the wrong end of a massacre today in the bookies but @GarryMonk and @LUFC made up for it. 💙⚽💛#MOT
Best of luck to all men today. There is a massive potential for a blowout so box clever and may your bets be fruitful 🙏🏻🤑 #stephensmassacre
